useCase.name: Select and create access derivatives for digital objects

preconditions.precondition: Digital objects are available for selection

successEndConditions.condition: Access derivatives successfully created and metadata updated

useCase.trigger: User selects digital objects for derivative creation

mainSequence.step: User Interface selects digital objects for derivative creation
Object Management System processes selected digital objects
Derivative Creation System creates access derivatives
Metadata System updates metadata with derivative details
Derivative Creation System sends success notification
Notification System notifies archivist of successful creation
